activationUrl.description: Full activation URL to retrieve the access token. It will be empty if the token is already retrieved.

createdAt.description: Time at which this recipient token was created, in epoch milliseconds.

expirationTime.description: Expiration timestamp of the token in epoch milliseconds.

id.description: Unique ID of the recipient token.

updatedAt.description: Time at which this recipient token was updated, in epoch milliseconds.
